page.title: 15Present day in the shop.
page.content: The shop is now run by Evelyn and Marion Ascroft who are married to the grandsons of the original Mr. Ascroft. The shop was extended in the summer of 1980 when the late Mrs Ascroft also helped in the shop. The shop which is the only general store in the Village of Merebrow sells groceries, sweets, tobacco, fruit and veg. Greeting cards mix with hardware, toys, stationery, jewellery. They are agents for a laundry and a cosmetic company and will sell you fancy goods. If you are hungry you can get hot pies, sandwiches, frozen foods including ice cream. Even cups of tea or coffee if you ask. The shop is open Monday to Friday 8.45am to 5.30pm and Saturday morning 8.30am to 12.30pm.
